other_tests.findings: A diffuse proliferation of monotonous cells consistent with primitive hematopoietic cells; positive for B-cell marker PAX5 and markers of lymphoid blasts (TdT and CD10).
Extensive involvement by the same population of lymphoid blasts.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At the end of four weeks of therapy, there were 4% leukemic blasts remaining in the bone marrow.

other_tests.findings: Positive for B-cell marker CD19, CD10, TdT; weakly positive for CD45; negative for mature B-cell marker CD20 and primordial stem-cell marker CD34.
To establish whether central nervous system disease is present.
